original_text: The rain pours down from the clouds. There is plenty for the people on the earth. The rain pours down from the clouds. There is plenty for the people on the earth. The rain pours down from the clouds. There is plenty for the people on the earth. The rain pours down from the clouds.
korean_text: 그것이 구름에서 내려 많은 사람에게 쏟아지느니라
